paper.title: A participative approach to forward planning and system change
paper.venue: Proceedings of the 2nd Conference of the European Cooperation on Informatics: Information Systems Methodology
paper.abstract: Forward planning and system design can be improved through the participation of the people who will eventually use the system, if they can be provided with the necessary skills.
